resources.string:
By continuing, you agree to the Terms of Service.
Note: The Fitness Privacy Policy describes how data
is handled in this service. Fitness sends diagnostics
data to help improve the application.

Fitness can track walking, running and cycling in
the background. This means you will get
 metrics like steps, distance and calories for all these
activities.

To do this, the app needs permission to
recognise your activity. Over time Fitness also uses
 this data to personalize your experience, and
better recognize activity.
This information lets Fitness estimates calories,\ndistance and the intensity of your activity. You will\n also get coaching that is tailored to you.
